questions.question: BASED OFF OF THE NAME OF THE PREVIOUS EVERYDAY VERSION, IT'S THE NAME OF THE FIREWORKS SHOW.
THE HEADLESS HORSEMAN RIDES ALONG MAIN STREET RIGHT BEFORE THIS PARADE.
MIKE WAZOWSKI AND SULLY HOST THEIR MONSTROUS SCREAM-O-WEEN BALL AT THIS LOCATION.
questions.answer: What is the Rockettower Plaza Stage/Tomorrowland Stage?

questions.question: THIS CHARACTER MAY HAVE HANDED OVER HIS DEED TO OWL, BUT, WHILE TRICK OR TREATING IN PHILARHAMGIC, YOU MIGHT FIND HIM ON THE SCREEN.
THIS TRIO OF WITCHES HOST THREE VILLIAN "SPELLTACULAR" SHOWS EVERY NIGHT.
THE PROGRAMMABLE SOFTWARE CONTROLLING THE DROP PROFILES OF THE TOWER OF TERROR DROPS HAS HAD THIS MANY SIGNIFICANT ITERATIONS.
THE TOWER IS THIS TALL, WHICH IS THE SAME HEIGHT AS EVEREST (GIVE OR TAKE SIX INCHES) IN ANIMAL KINGDOM. ANY HIGHER, AND IT WOULD HAVE NEEDED A LIGHT.
THE DESIGN FOR THE RIDE'S AUTONOMOUS GUIDED VEHICLES WERE INSPIRED BY THIS EPCOT ATTRACTION.
VERTICAL VEHICLE CONVEYANCES CARRY THE RIDE VEHICLE IN EACH OF THIS MANY VERTICAL SHAFTS THROUGHOUT THE ATTRACTION.
TAKEN FROM THE INTRODUCTION OF THE TWILIGHT ZONE EPISODE "IT'S A GOOD LIFE", ROD SERLING ORIGINALLY POINTS TO A MAP OF THIS COUNTRY.
I AM THE CHAIRMAN OF WALT DISNEY'S PARKS AND RESORTS, AND, ACCORDING TO THE FIFTH AUTOCOMPLETE ON GOOGLE, A ROBOT.
I AM THE IMAGINEER RESPONSIBLE FOR MOST OF ANIMAL KINGDOM, BUT YOU MIGHT JUST KNOW ME FOR MY EAR.
I AM THE CEO THAT GAVE YOU THAT STUDIOS PARK, AND... YOU MANIACS! YOU BLEW IT UP! AH, DAMN YOU!
I WRITE BOOKS ON DISNEY IMAGINEERING, MADE THE LEGEND OF CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW, BUT NOW I'M AT UNIVERSAL MAKING JIMMY FALLON'S CAR FLOAT!
AFTER THE NAVY, I DRAINED THE SWAMP, PLANNED, AND BUILT THE FLORIDA PROJECT, BUT YOU MIGHT JUST KNOW ME FOR THE BOAT NAMED AFTER ME.
ON THE LIVE BACK TO THE FUTURE OF HIS FAVORITE RIDE, DAVID SMITH COMMENTED ON THE BATTERING RAM ON THE VIDEO OF ITS OPENING IN DISNEYLAND, SAYING "IT'S EARLY FASTPASS!"
questions.answer: What is Pirates of the Caribbean?

questions.question: DAVID SMITH'S DVC HOME RESORT IS THIS FIRST DVC RESORT IN THE MAGIC KINGDOM RESORT AREA.
THE ONLY TIME DAVID SMITH WAS EVACUATED FROM A RIDE WAS RIGHT BEFORE THE HEFFALUMP ROOM ON THIS ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh?

questions.question: YOU MIGHT FIND DAVID SMITH IN THIS DISNEY SPRINGS RESTAURANT FROM AN IRON CHEF.
DAVID SMITH ALMOST GOT ONE MILLION POINTS AT THIS ATTRACTION AND 32000 POINTS FOUR TIMES.
questions.answer: What is Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Play It?

questions.question: THE WONDERFUL THING ABOUT THIS PUMPKIN IS THAT IT'S THE ONLY ONE!
THAT'S PUMPKIN WITH ONE EYE!
THIS PUMPKIN MAY BE AROUND WORLD SHOWCASE.
THIS PUMPKIN KINDA RESEMBLES ANGELINA JOLIE.
THIS PUMPKIN HAS FRIENDS ON THE OTHER SIDE.
WE DON'T KNOW WHEN THIS ATTRACTION WILL OPEN AGAIN SINCE IT CLOSED ALMOST A YEAR AGO, BUT WHEN IT DOES, IS IT GONNA BE HUGE?
questions.answer: What is the Hall of Presidents?

questions.question: OVER 5.7 MILLION GUESTS RODE THIS ATTRACTION IN ITS FIRST FULL YEAR OF OPERATION, BUT WERE THEY THE LAST?
IN THE BAMBOO ROOM AT THIS RESTAURANT, YOU CAN DINE WITH AN IMAGINEER. FEEL FREE TO ASK SOME QUESTIONS THERE.
THIS ATTRACTION HAS POSTERS FOR "MY FAIR LADYBUG", "ANTIE", AND "WEB SIDE STORY", BUT HOW MUCH BUZZ IS THERE ABOUT THESE SHOWS?
questions.answer: What is It's Tough To Be a Bug?

questions.question: YOU CAN ORDER LOTS OF FOOD AT THIS DISNEY SPRINGS BAR FILLED WITH ADVENTURE NODS AND DECOR, BUT WHY DID YOU HAVE TO HAVE STEAKS?!
questions.answer: What is Jock Lindsey's Hangar Bar?

questions.question: THIS POINT OF INTEREST WAS A SIZE 605 and 7/8
THIS FANTASYLAND ATTRACTION SAT ABANDONED FOR A DECADE BEFORE IT WAS FINALLY DEMOLISHED IN 2004 TO MAKE SPACE FOR A PLAYGROUND.
questions.answer: What is 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea?

questions.question: THIS 4D EPCOT FILM WAS, IRONICALLY, REPLACED IN 2010 BY THE SAME MOVIE THAT IT REPLACED IN 1994.
questions.answer: What is Honey I Shrunk the Audience?

questions.question: THIS SHORT-LIVED BOAT RIDE OPENED WITH ANIMAL KINGDOM IN APRIL, 1998 AND CLOSED JUST OVER A YEAR LATER. THE BOATS ARE STILL IN ONE PIECE BEHIND PRIMEVAL WHIRL AND FINDING NEMO - THE MUSICAL.
THE FLOATS FROM THIS PARADE WERE BROKEN UP INTO COLLECTIBLE PINS
A WHOLE LAND DEDICATED TO THIS ACADEMY AWARD-WINNING FILM WAS PLANNED FOR SUNSET BOULEVARD, BUT A DISAGREEMENT WITH SPIELBERG AND AMBLIN ENTERTAINMENT TANKED IT.
THIS ATTRACTION WOULD HAVE TAKEN GUESTS ON A THRILLING RIDE TO ATLANTIS, IF NOT FOR THE MOVIE'S POOR PERFORMANCE AND OTHER FACTORS.
THIS MOUNTAIN WAS PROPOSED AS A ROLLER COASTER FOR JAPAN AT EPCOT, BUT DISNEY ALREADY HAD A SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT WITH KODAK.
JIM HENSON EXPLAINED THIS ATTRACTION AS "A BACKSTAGE RIDE EXPLAINING HOW MOVIES WERE SHOT...AND ALL THE INFORMATION IS WRONG".
questions.answer: What is the Great Muppet Movie Ride?

questions.question: BUDGETARY REASONS AND DEADLINES CAUSED THE CANCELLATION OF PLANS FOR A CRUISE BOAT RIDE ON THIS GERMAN RIVER
CHEDDAR CHEESE SOUP, MOOSEHEAD RADLER, APPLE ICE WINE
GLOWNUT, T=C^2, RGB
PAELLA, SEAFOOD SALAD WITH SHRIMP, CASA CASTILLO MONASTRELL
MADRAS RED CURRY, KORMA CHICKEN, SULA SHIRAZ
PIGGY WINGS, CHOCOLATE PICANTE, RAVENSWOOD ZINFADEL
LET'S START WITH A LITTLE WINE HERE AT THE FIRST PLACE IN THE MAGIC KINGDOM TO OFFER ALCOHOL.
GUESTS COULD HAVE A MAGICAL STAR COCKTAIL OR DAD'S ELECTRIC LEMONADE HERE, RIGHT NEXT TO THE KITCHEN.
THERE'S OVER SEVEN ... TYPES OF LAGERS AT THIS PLACE, INCLUDING SAFARI, SINGHA, AND TIGER LAGER, BUT NOT ENOUGH TO FORGET THAT RUNNING GAG.
DRINK AWAY THE THOUGHT OF HAVING TO PLAY ANOTHER GAME OF JEOPARDY WITH CRAFT BEERS AT THE LEGACY SHOWPLACE HERE.
HAVE A MARGARITA AT THIS PLACE IN THE EPCOT MEXICO PAVILION WHOSE NAME MIGHT MAKE YOU THINK IT COULD BE IN STAR WARS: GALAXY'S EDGE.
questions.answer: What is La Cantina de San Angel?

questions.question: WELCOME, FOOLISH MORTALS, TO THE STRETCHING ROOM, WHERE YOU CAN FIND THIS MANY PICTURES.
LOOK ALIVE! THE STRETCHING ROOM PICTURES HAVE THIS MANY PEOPLE.
DURING YOUR TOUR, THE BACKSTAGE AREA FOR CAST MEMBERS IS REFERRED TO AS THIS.
THIS ANIMAL APPEARS IN SEVERAL SCENES AND WAS ONCE CONSIDERED A POSSIBLE NARRATOR FOR THE RIDE.
AFTER THE 2007 REFURBISHMENT, KAT CRESSIDA BECAME THE VOICE OF THIS WIDOW BRIDE.

double-jeopardy.name: LET'S JUST PUT THE GHOST HOST IN IT

questions.question: "THAT IS THE TIME WHEN MONSTERS ARE PRESENT, PRACTICING THEIR JOKES WITH FOOLISH DELIGHT."
questions.answer: What is Monsters Inc. Laugh Floor?

questions.question: "OUR TOUR BEGAN HERE IN THIS GALLERY WHERE YOU SAW PAINTINGS OF SOME OUR MOVIE CREATIONS AS THEY APPEARED IN THEIR EDITABLE, STORYBOARDING STATE."
questions.answer: What is the Magic of Disney Animation?

questions.question: "THERE ARE SEVERAL PROMINENT BIRDS WHO HAVE RETIRED HERE FROM CREEPY OLD COOPS FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD. ACTUALLY WE HAVE 999 HAPPY ANIMATRONIC FOWL HERE, BUT THERE'S ROOM FOR A THOUSAND. ANY VOLUNTEERS?"
questions.answer: What is the Enchanted Tiki Room?

questions.question: "AND NOW, A LINEAR INDUCTION CARRIAGE APPROACHES TO CARRY YOU INTO THE BOUNDLESS REALM OF THE FUTURE-NATURAL. TAKE YOUR LOVED ONES BY THE HAND, PLEASE, AND KINDLY WATCH YOUR STEP."
"AH, THERE YOU ARE, AND JUST IN TIME! THERE'S A LITTLE MATTER I FORGOT TO MENTION. BEWARE OF HITCHHIKING IGUANADONS!"

final-jeopardy.category: THINGS THAT WERE IN HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS
final-jeopardy.question: THIS FRANCHISE, BOUGHT BY DISNEY IN 2001, HAD CHARACTER APPEARANCES IN HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS UNTIL IT WAS BOUGHT BACK BY ITS CREATOR, HAIM SABAN.
